title: Ethnographic Record
description: Structured data for an ethnographic or historical account, focusing on elements relevant to critical transitions.

title.description: The title or subject of the account.

source.description: Origin of the account (e.g., book, article, oral history reference).

period_or_event.description: The historical period or specific event the account describes.

geographic_location.description: The primary geographic location of the events.

summary.description: A concise summary of the ethnographic or historical account.

critical_elements_observed.description: Key observations related to 'criticality' or phase transitions as described in the Chrysalis framework.

eight_step_protocol_relevance.description: How elements of the account relate to the Eight-Step Navigation Protocol.

Purification.description: Description of how this step is observed in the account.
